name: Building Blocks
description:
We work with clients to identify digital opportunities that will increase revenue, develop relationships and improve efficiencies. Our creative, technical and operational experts then make them happen - rapidly, reliably and at scale. Our technology specialisms include Sitecore (Gold partner), SDL (awarded partner with the 'most implementations'​), BloomReach and e-Spirit.
Clients include GE, Element Materials Technology, Imperial Brands, Celebrity Cruises, Yara, Adama Agricultural Solutions, Guinness World Records, Guardian Industries and Lloyd's Register .We are part of Dept - an international network of leading digital agencies. From our offices across Europe and the US, 500 of the most talented and experienced people in our industry combine creativity, technology and data to deliver digital products and services that build brands, grow businesses and make people’s lives easier.
